verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician עַלְמ֥וּת [T'al-Mut לַבֵּ֗ן <S%H4192><s%> lab-Ben, death מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David אוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> o-Deh I will praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [thee] O LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi; with my whole heart אֲ֝סַפְּרָ֗ה <S%H5608><s%> 'a-sap-pe-Rah, I will shew forth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha. all thy marvellous works

חָֽנְנֵ֬נִי <S%H2603><s%> cha-ne-Ne-ni Have mercy יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh upon me O LORD רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh consider עָ֭נְיִי <S%H6040><s%> 'A-ne-yi my trouble מִשֹּׂנְאָ֑י <S%H8130><s%> mis-so-ne-'Ai; [which I suffer] of them that hate מְ֝רוֹמְמִ֗י <S%H7311><s%> me-rom-Mi, me thou that liftest me up מִשַּׁ֥עֲרֵי <S%H8179><s%> mish-Sha-'a-rei from the gates מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> Ma-vet. of death
